effect.x-y: Inflicts regular damage. Hits 2–5 times in one turn. Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times. Averages to 3 hits per use.
effect.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. Hits 2–5 times in one turn. Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times. Averages to 3 hits per use.

flavor_text.x-y: The user forcefully shoots seeds at the target two to five times in a row.
flavor_text.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: The user forcefully shoots seeds at the target two to five times in a row.
